actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

official_title: To amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to provide market rate payments for child care services provided under such Act.
short_title: Fair Care for Kids Act of 2002

summary.text: Fair Care for Kids Act of 2002 - Amends the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to require State plans to provide for payments at not less than applicable market rates for child care services provided under such Act.

titles.title: Fair Care for Kids Act of 2002
To amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to provide market rate payments for child care services provided under such Act.
